features: 【72 Vibrant Color Pencils】With 72 vibrant and vivid colors to choose from, this colored pencil set offers a wide range of shades and hues to bring your imagination to life. From intense and bright colors to softer pastel tones, you'll have everything you need to explore different styles and capture your artistic vision. Use them for landscapes, portraits, still life, or any other subject matter, giving you endless possibilities for coloring and creating beautiful designs.

【Soft Core for Smooth Application】iBayam Colored Pencils feature a soft core that allows for easy and smooth coloring application and ensures a rich and vibrant color laydown, allowing you to achieve stunning effects with each stroke, ideal for layering, sketching, drawing, shading, blending, and adding depth to your artwork. Whether you are an experienced artist or just starting out, these pencils gives you with the flexibility and control you need to create beautiful artwork.

【Assorted Colors with Names & Numbers】Each set includes 72 assorted colors, making it easy to find the shade you need for your projects, with each color assigned a unique name and number for easy identification and collection. The assortment includes everything from bold reds and blues to delicate pastels and earthy tones, giving you endless options for bringing your ideas to life. Each pencil is pre-sharpened and ready for use. Comfortable grip reduces fatigue and lets you focus on creativity.

【Unleash Your Creativity】Whether you're a professional artist, a hobbyist or just looking for a fun way to unwind, these colorful pencils provide the vibrant hues, blendability and ease-of-use you need. Enhance your artwork, explore new techniques and bring your ideas to life with this wonderful colored pencil set. Not just for coloring, they can be used for writing, signing, doodling, note-taking and other creative projects. Their versatility makes them a must-have for artists of all levels.

【Ideal Gift Choice for All Ages】The colorful pencil set comes in a stylish packaging that it convenient to carry around and store, making it a perfect present option for birthdays, Christmas Gifts, holidays, or any special occasion whether it's for yourself or a loved one. Plus, the set comes neatly organized in a tin case, the individual slots for each pencil ensure easy access and prevent them from rolling away. Watch as their eyes light up when your loved ones unwrap this exciting gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are really nice pencils. I use them on everything I color. Great on cards or to color in books. nice strong lead and beautiful colors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are a nice set, variety of different colors and it came with 72!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pigmentation and creamy
reviews.reviewText: I love how these colored pencils perform. They’re very smooth and creamy and blend well. The colors are vibrant and pigmented.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So many colors!
reviews.reviewText: I am an old artist and my favorite medium is pencils. Consequently, I am very picky about the pencils I use. While I have settled on Berol Prismacolors, I am not going to put that much money into the pencils of my 7 year old niece though I don't want to give her trash, either. I chose these for the range of colors and the cost for the set. I did check reviews to make sure they weren't garbage. These are very nice pencils with good color coverage, many options, and quality leads with high pigment. However, as happens with all soft core pencils, even the expensive ones, they are easy to break when sharpening. The niece has not learned the wrist trick to keep this from happening, but that took me years to master. Until then, the broken lead frustration is real. But again, that is not something that is to these pencils alone, just soft core leads. For the cost and the number of pencils you get in this set, this is a good value and a great starting set! Definitely good for beginners and very giftable. Recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you don't buy these I'm sorry for ya!
reviews.reviewText: These are the best colored pencils that I have ever purchased! No exaggeration at all. The colors are absolutely gorgeous They are sturdy and sharpen easily I'm in love!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These colored pencils are good
reviews.reviewText: I love the colored pencils. The colors are so pretty and vibrant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the best for adult coloring
reviews.reviewText: I wasn’t that impressed with these colored pencils. I use them for my adult color by number pages. They tend to break the tip a lot and so you have to keep sharpening them and they don’t last long. Pretty colors just not the best colored pencils.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these to use in my high school classroom. I wanted to get as many colors as possible for the best price. The students really like the color options and say the quality is good.
